title: Group productivity (TEFC)
creator_credit: Ron Underwood, Janice M Reynolds and CRM Productions
brief_description: Divides group development into three phases: Orientation, Power Distribution and Tasking, Team Production and Feedback. Demonstrates the delicate balance between tasking and nurturing for each phase and gives examples of coping and motivational strategies useful in daily living.
